name: Abyssal Plain
description: The flat bottom of the deepest ocean creates a mysterious and hostile environment under extreme pressure. The unique conditions support bizarre deep-sea creatures, while the depths can hide ancient ruins or valuable minerals.
atmosphere: Crushing darkness broken only by bioluminescent creatures pulsing with alien light across the flat ocean floor. Bone-chilling cold and immense pressure create an environment hostile to surface life. Strange deep-sea creatures drift through the perpetual night. Sediment covers ancient secrets in this underwater desert.
